mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_HISTORY (study_id, round, study_date, title, presenter, notes) VALUES (#{studyId}, #{round}, #{studyDate}, #{title}, #{presenter}, #{notes})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_HISTORY WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId}
SELECT MAX(ROUND) AS ROUND FROM STUDY_HISTORY WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId}

SELECT S.title AS study_title, SH.round AS round, SH.study_date AS study_date, SH.title AS study_history_title FROM STUDY AS S JOIN STUDY_HISTORY AS SH ON S.study_id = SH.study_id WHERE SH.study_id = #{studyId}
